title: SMC_CheckLimits (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_CheckLimits
This function block may be employed for checking whether the current set points
of the drive exceed the maximum values configured in the controller.
The result of the check will be indicated by output
bLimitsExceeded
.

rows.Name: bEnable
rows.Comment: TRUE: Starts the execution of function block.

rows:
TRUE: Checks the set acceleration and the set
deceleration.

rows.Name: bBusy
rows.Comment:
TRUE: Execution of function block has nor been finished
yet.

rows: TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.

TRUE: The current set points exceed the limits which are defined within the PLC configuration
and stored withinAXIS_REF_SM3(fSWMaxVelocity,fSWMaxAccelerationorfSWMaxDeceleration).
